price: Mose kaa sε: “Nokorε sε mehwehwε ntwitwagyeε wͻ me Wura Nyankopͻn ne wo Wura Nyankopͻn no hͻ afiri onipa biara a ͻyε ahomasoͻ na ͻnnye Akontabuo Da no nnie no ho.
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُم مِّن كُلِّ مُتَكَبِّرٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum min kulli mutakabbirin lā yu'minu biyawmi al-ḥisābi
